T02bsu055_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamanekaiśca bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sarvaiḥ kumārabhūtaiḥ |
T02bsu055_u:5: tatra khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma ||
T02bsu055_u:6: ayaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ arthaḥ - prajñāpāramitā na dvayena
T02bsu055_u:20: na atathata(yā) na bhūtakoṭyā na abhūtakoṭyā(vedi)tavyā ||
T02bsu055_u:36: tejodhātu - vāyudhātu - ākāśadhātu - vijñānadhātvaparyantatvāt prajñāpāramitā aparyantā |
T02bsu055_u:48: tadyathā - ādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā ādhyātmābahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramā(rtha)śūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā
T02bsu055_u:49: anādyagraśūnyatā (ana)pakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā iti |
T02bsu055_u:51: (Kauś, Vaidya 96) tārakā timiraṃ dīpo māyāvaśyāya buddhudam |
T02bsu055_u:52: supinaṃ vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtamiti ||
T02bsu055_u:57: namo daśasu dikṣu sarveṣāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānām |
T02bsu055_u:58: namo bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai sarvatathāgatasunibhāyai sarvatathāgatānujñātavijñātāyai |(oṃ) prajñe mahāprajñe prajñāvabhāse
T02bsu055_u:61: budhya budhya, kampa kampa, cala cala, rāva rāva, āgaccha bhagavate mā
T02bsu055_u:65: tadyathā - munidharme saṃgrahadharme anugrahadharme vimokṣadharme sattvānugrahadharme vaiśramaṇadharme samantanuparivartanadharme guṇigrahasaṃgrahadharme sarvatrānugatadharme sarvakālaparipūrṇadharme svāhā ||
T02bsu055_u:70: tadyathā - gaṅgā gaṅgā na tīrāvabhāsa gaṅgā svāhā
T02bsu055_u:72: tadyathā śrīye śrīye muni śrīye śrīyase svāhā ||
T02bsu055_u:76: tadyathā - oṃ hrī śrī dhī śruti smṛti mati gati vijaye svāhā ||
T02bsu055_u:78: tadyathā - bambari bambari mahābambari būru būru mahābūru svāhā ||
T02bsu055_u:87: tadyathā - gate gate pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā ||
T02bsu055_u:89: āttamanā āyuṣmān sāriputraḥ śakro devānāmindraste ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sadevagandharvamānuṣāsuraśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan ||
